description: Urgent notice on the treatment of pneumonia of unknown cause - Wuhan
27 people with pneumonia of unknown cause reported to the WHO.
WHO confirmed that a novel coronavirus had been isolated from one person who was hospitalised. 41 cases confirmed.
62 new cases, 8 deaths. * Hubei reported 17 deaths, all in Wuhan.
70 new cases. (Changing number from 390 to 495 due to official number given by Hubei). * 6 new deaths.
Death of a doctor confirmed. * 46 new cases, 6 new deaths.
+1,033, highest daily number of cases. 41 deaths, highest daily number of deaths.
+1,766, more than 10,000 cases. 53 deaths, including doctor Li Wenliang.
First two confirmed cases of people that visited Wuhan.
Eight confirmed cases. 2 locally transmitted. * 4 more cases.
3 more cases. * 5 more cases. * 2 more cases.
3 more cases, locally transmitted. * 9 more cases, 3 locally transmitted. * 5 more cases.
4 more cases. * First death and 8 more cases.
11 new cases. 2nd city with over a 100 cases outside Hubei. * 9 new cases.
4 more cases, 3 imported and one transmitted.
13 new cases, 12 of the 53 cases were locally transmitted and 20 cases were foreigners.
5 new cases. 3rd city outside Hubei reaching 100+ cases. * 11 new cases.
First 12 confirmed cases, including 1 doctor and 4 nurses (human-to-human transmission).
Hubei starting to report province-wide cases. (See Hubei Province).
52 new cases reported, largest single day entry besides Wuhan.
58 new cases added, first time with more newly added cases than Wuhan (46). * First 2 deaths.
276 new cases. First city with more than a thousand cases besides Wuhan. One death.
+144, third city to have more than 2k cases. 4 deaths.
7 more cases. City on lockdown. * 13 more cases.
2 more cases. * City on lockdown * 2 new cases.
First confirmed case resulting in death outside Wuhan and outside Hubei province. 80-year-old from Nanpi County (Cangzhou).
Partial lockdown, closure of railway system.
+43, more than a hundred cases. 2 deaths.
First 5 confirmed cases and one death.
First case in Shangluo, Shaanxi was infected in Huangshi (locally transmitted).
First confirmed case that resulted in death.
First 22 confirmed cases, making it the city with highest number of cases reported in a single day outside Wuhan.
45 new cases and 1 death. Updating city to lockdown.
First confirmed case resulting in death.
10 new cases. 23 total and 2 first deaths.
First death and second confirmed case.
First confirmed case in the Philippines, treated at San Lazaro Hospital according to Sen. Christopher Go
Second case and first death outside China.
First confirmed case (imported). Second case confirmed a coronavirus, waiting for further info.
One more case. * 2 more cases, a previous case was transmitted by family member, unclear where.
Two more cases, railway workers colleagues of 2nd case. * One more case. * One more case.
One more case, locally transmitted by 3rd case.
25 confirmed cases. Plus 130 from previous updates.
+4, 22 total (red). First city in Hainan with more than 20 cases. +8 cases.
First confirmed case in Gansu province. Patient had a history of travel to Hunan and Jiangxi provinces.
